title: Change Email
body:
**I want to change my password, but when you move right along as it should, but the league of legends do not send passcode to me.**
Sorry my english is so bad..
Help me please.

replies.body: An email will be sent to the address registered to the account.  If you need help changing or verifying your email, you can reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our account team can help you with recovery, and I recommend reviewing our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide in preperation of questions yuo may be asked to verify ownership.  We'll respond to your ticket as soon as we can!

can i change my email? if so how?
{{champion:63}}
